#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
inline long long inp()
    {
    long long noRead=0;
    char p=getchar_unlocked();
    for(;p<33;){p=getchar_unlocked();};
    while(p>32)
    {
    noRead = (noRead << 3) + (noRead << 1) + (p - '0');
    p=getchar_unlocked();
    }
    return noRead;
    };
long long t,n,a,sum,m,av,i;
int main()
{
	t=inp();
	while(t--)
	{
		n=inp();
		a=inp();
		sum=a;m=a;av=a;
		for(i=1;i<n;i++)
		{
			a=inp();
			sum+=a;
			av=sum/(i+1);
			if(m > av) m=av;
		}
		printf("%lld\n",m);
	}
	return 0;
}
